channel.title: Chilled and Slienced Bugs (Likely?)
channel.description: #### What happened? I still being able to use Emote as being Chilled/Slienced #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? The Emote button should begone like the day ability one, or atleast i cant use Emote #### Steps to reproduce: Wait for Slienced/Chilled and use Emote. #### Comments: This is a minor bug but can be extremely powerful in some situration. -Master Bug Report

item.title: Chilled and Slienced Bugs (Likely?)
item.dc:creator: SweetyCake
item.description:
What happened?

I still being able to use Emote as being Chilled/Slienced

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

The Emote button should begone like the day ability one, or atleast i cant use Emote

Steps to reproduce:

Wait for Slienced/Chilled and use Emote.

Comments:

This is a minor bug but can be extremely powerful in some situration.
-Master Bug Report

Read full topic
